price: У њима ће вечно да бораве. Уистину, код Аллаха је велика награда.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan inna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
